verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
verses.translation_en: I swear by this city, Makkah -
verses.translation_zh: 我以这个地方盟誓--

verses.translation_en: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -
verses.translation_zh: 你将在那里，不受羁束--

verses.translation_en: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],
verses.translation_zh: 我以一个父亲和他所生的子孙盟誓，

verses.translation_en: We have certainly created man into hardship.
verses.translation_zh: 我确已把人创造在苦难里。

verses.text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation_en: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?
verses.translation_zh: 他以为任何人都不能制裁他吗？

verses.translation_en: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."
verses.translation_zh: 他说：我花费了许多财产！

verses.translation_en: Does he think that no one has seen him?
verses.translation_zh: 他以为任何人都没有看见他吗？

verses.translation_en: Have We not made for him two eyes?
verses.translation_zh: 难道我没有为他创造两只眼睛、

verses.translation_en: And a tongue and two lips?
verses.translation_zh: 一条舌头、两片嘴唇，

verses.translation_en: And have shown him the two ways?
verses.translation_zh: 并指示他两条明显的道路吗？

verses.translation_en: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.
verses.translation_zh: 他怎麽不超越山径呢？

verses.translation_en: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?
verses.translation_zh: 你怎能知道超越山径是什麽事？

verses.translation_en: It is the freeing of a slave
verses.translation_zh: 是释放奴隶，

verses.text: أَوْ إِطْعَٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.translation_en: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger
verses.translation_zh: 或在饥荒日赈济

verses.translation_en: An orphan of near relationship
verses.translation_zh: 亲戚的孤儿，

verses.translation_en: Or a needy person in misery
verses.translation_zh: 或困穷的贫民；

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.translation_en: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.
verses.translation_zh: 同时，他是一个信道而且行善，并以坚忍相勉，以慈悯相助者。

verses.translation_en: Those are the companions of the right.
verses.translation_zh: 这等人是幸福的。

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
verses.translation_en: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.
verses.translation_zh: 不信我的迹象者，是薄命的，

verses.translation_en: Over them will be fire closed in.
verses.translation_zh: 他们将被关在火狱里。
